text: Happy New Year, Nicola! I hope that you had a great time over the holidays, and in Italy! Did you manage to solve the issue with the stopmotion pipeline? I'll ask around this week - hopefully someone will have some knowledge to share :] Did you make much progress on your showreel over the holidays - I'd be more than happy to take a look! It's been a few days of trying to remember how a computer works after ignoring them for two weeks, haha!
